oai_dc:dc.dc:title: FABRICATION OF SIMPLE, STURDY AND INEXPENSIVE CONTROLLED-ATMOSPHERE GLOVE BOX FOR ROUTINE USE
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAO, P
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Several simple and easily adaptable techniques have been developed for fabricating a suitable and sturdy controlled-atmosphere glove box to match specific needs of teaches and researchers using inexpensive materials and simple workmanship. Further, various methods have been developed to maintain the box at low oxygen and moisture contents with relatively low recurring expenses.
